snippet.title: Mecha BREAK Open Beta Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Mecha BREAK is a multiplayer armoured brawler where you vie to control the skies and duel with exoskeletal enemies. A trailer aired during the Future Games Show Spring Showcase, pointing towards the game's upcoming Open Beta. Mecha Break is coming to PC and Xbox later this year.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #mechabreak 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
